<!--
PR Title Format: <type>: <description>

Types:
  feat:    New feature or functionality
  fix:     Bug fix
  content: Blog posts or content updates
  style:   Styling, CSS, visual changes
  maint:   Maintenance, refactoring, dependencies
  docs:    Documentation updates
  chore:   Build, config, tooling

Examples:
  feat: add dark mode toggle
  fix: correct date formatting on blog posts
  content: add post about typescript patterns
  style: improve mobile navigation
  maint: upgrade astro to v5
-->
